projects.title: Virtual Robot Simulator
projects.description: A webpage with 3D model of Delta Robot that can be controlled. Main objective of this project is to learn about Delta Robot, its structure, motion, working. Designed all the components for 3D model of robot in Fusion 360 and Assembled them. Created a reactive webpage using HTML and CSS where 3D model is deployed.

projects.title: Office Assistant Bot
projects.description: A mobile bot that has facial recognition and can be controlled using hand gestures and voice control. Used ROS to control motion of Bot through Arduino Mega and L293D motor driver. Configured Raspberry Pi for master slave configuration and command control features.
